titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (NEUROMOTOR QUESTION G) - Description

div.p: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (NEUROMOTOR QUESTION G) is the PERSON SCORE for question G of the Neuromotor section of the TPRG-SEND Two Year Corrected Age Outcome Assessment.
The question asks "Does this child have difficulty with the use of both hands?".
